Articles.Content:
Hopefully this is an easy question. Since 1.0 I've noticed the throttle will reduce itself or cut off completely on both vertical rocket launches and in atmospheric flight with spaceplanes. This happens when the rocket gets too far off vertical too quickly (for the game's taste) and at different pitches in a space plane depending on speed. In a plane I have to drop the nose and can only achieve high speeds while in level flight. Any ideas what is causing this or how to prevent it?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-18T21:56:43Z" title="05/18/2015 09:56  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 18, 2015</time> by Wipfel**
  
Answered
Are you by chance using MechJeb? Its "Limit acceleration to X m/s" and "Limit to Terminal Velocity" functions have this effect even when not using autopilot.
